definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: remember (As zikâru, name, mention, cf. n. zikru, Hpt in KAT:2 Gloss. i Lyon:Sarg.; Zinj. [[זכר]], Ar. d-akara, Aram [[דְּכַר]], dkar, Palm. [[דרכנא]] monument, Vog:No. 36 b, [[דכיר]] memorial, Vog:No. 62, Sab. in n.pr. [[ידַכראל]] DHM:Epigr. Denkm. 43, but Eth. zakara:)—

definitions.title: I.
definitions.body: human subj.
remember, recall, call to mind, usu. as affecting present feeling, thought, or action:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: remember past experiences (acc.) Ge 42:9 (E), 2Ki 9:25 (acc. pers. agent); sq. cl. with [[מִי]] Job 4:7; things formerly known (acc.) Je 17:2; sq. cl. with [[כִּי]] Ju Jdg 9:2; with implied regret, longing Nu 11:5 (JE), Ps 42:5, Ps 137:1, La 1:7 cf. Ps 77:7, neg. Ps 137:6 (‖[[שׁכח]] v:Ps 137:5); so (sq. [[בְּ]]) Je 3:16 (‖[[עלה על לב]] and [[פקד]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: recall past distress, etc.; obj. not expressed, La 3:20 ([[זכור זכר]]), Job 11:16 ([[שׁכח]] in ‖ cl.); neg., sq. acc. Is 54:4 (‖[[שׁכח]]), Pr 31:7 (‖ id.).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: remember sins, (1) to repent of them De 9:7 (+ [[אל־תשׁכח]], sq. cl. with [[את־אשׁר]]), elsewh. only Ezek., usu. c. acc. Ez Eze 16:61 (+ [[וְנִכְלַמְתְּ]]), v:Eze 16:63 (obj. not expressed), Eze 20:43, Eze 36:21; (2) to renew and repeat them Ez Eze 23:19, neg. v:Eze 23:27.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: esp. remember the dealings of ´[[י]], expressed in great variety of terms in acc., De 7:18, De 8:2, De 24:9, De 32:7 (‖[[בין]]), Is 46:9, Is 63:11, Ps 77:12 Qr (Kt Hiph. q.v.) v:Ps 77:12, Ps 105:5, Ps 143:5 (‖[[הגיתי]], [[אֲשׂוֹחֵחַ]]) 1Ch 16:12; negatively, Is 43:18; (‖[[אַל תִּתְבּׂנׇ֑נוּ]]), Ez Eze 16:22, Eze 16:43, Ps 78:42, Ps 106:7, Ne 9:17 (‖[[וַיְמָאֲנוּ לִשְׁמׂעַ]]); obj. cl. with [[בִּי]] esp. D, De 5:15, De 15:15, De 16:12, De 24:18, De 24:22, Ps 78:35.
remember persons (human subj.),

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: to their advantage:—sq. acc. Ge 40:14 (E), v:Ge 40:23 (E; neg., ‖[[שׁכח]]), 1Sa 25:31.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: to make use of them (acc.) Na 2:6.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: their acts (acc.) to their advantage 2Ch 24:22, to their disadvantage 2Sa 19:20 (neg.); to make vengeance De 25:17.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: remember human obligations, acc. rei: [[בְּרִית אַחִים]] Am 1:9; cf. perh. Es 2:1 (acc. pers. and also of deed); neg. Ec 9:15 (acc. pers.), Ps 109:16 (sq. [[חסד עשׂות]]).
remember ´[[י]]:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: call him to mind 2Sa 14:11 (i.e. recall a specific command of his).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: recall, and (esp.) keep ´[[י]] in mind De 8:18, Je 51:50, Is 64:4 (‖[[עשׂה חדק]]), Ez Eze 6:9, Zec 10:9, Joe 2:8, Ps 42:7, Ps 63:7 (‖[[אהגה]]), Ps 77:4, Ne 4:8; negatively Ju Jdg 8:34, Is 17:10 (opp. [[שׁכח]]), Is 57:11 (‖[[לאׁ שַׂמְתְּ עַל־לִבֵּךְ]]); cf. also [[אֶתאבּוֹרְאֶָךָ]] ´[[ז]] Ec 12:1, and (no obj. expressed) Ps 22:28 (+ ´[[וישׁובו אל י]]); remember ´[[י]]'s name Ps 119:55.
remember:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: words of Moses Jos 1:13 (D) Mal 3:22; ´[[י]]'s instructions through prophet Is 44:21, 46:48 (‖[[השׁיבו על לב]]), also Mic 6:5 (sq. cl. with [[מה]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: commandments of ´[[י]] (so as to do them) Nu 15:39 (P, or H), v:Nu 15:40 (P; + [[ועשׂיתם]]), Ps 103:18 (+ [[לעשׂותם]]), Ps 119:52 ([[משׁפטים]]); his covenant 1Ch 16:15.

think of or on, call to mind something present or future:—sq. acc., issue of conduct Is 47:7, La 1:9 (end of Jerusalem); fight with crocodile Job 40:32; obj. a general truth, prosperity of wicked Job 21:6 (obj. not expr.); (fleeting) days of life Ec 5:19; (coming) days of darkness, Ec 11:8; a duty Job 36:24 (sq. cl. with [[כִּי]]).
remember a day, to observe, commemorate it:—day of Exodus Ex 13:3 (J) De 16:3; sabbath Ex 20:8 (E; ‖[[שׂמר]] De 5:12).
remember, with implied mention of, obj. ´[[י]] Je 20:9 (‖[[דִּבֶּר בִּשְׁמוֹ]]); ´[[מַשָּׂא י]] Je 23:36.
remember persons:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: individuals, with kindness, granting requests, protecting, delivering etc., c. acc. pers., Ge 30:22 (E), 1Sa 1:11 (opp. [[שׁכח]]), v:1Sa 1:19, Ju Jdg 16:28 (sq. [[וְחַזְּקֵנִי]]); Je 15:15 (‖[[פָּקְדֵנִי]]), Ps 106:4 (‖ id.), Job 14:13 (+ [[תשׁית לי חק]]), also Ge 8:1 (P), Ge 19:29 (P); neg. Ps 88:6 (‖[[מידך נִגְזׇרָוּ]]); sq. [[לְ]] pers. Ps 25:7 (yet cf. Che); sq. acc. rei + [[לְ]] pers. (dat. commod.) Ne 5:19, Ne 13:14, Ne 13:22, Ne 13:31.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: individuals, to punish, sq. [[לְ]] pers. Ne 6:14, Ne 13:29.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: his servants, people, the afflicted, (graciously) sq. [[לְ]] Ex 32:13 (JE), De 9:27, Ps 136:23; sq. acc. Ps 9:13 (opp. [[שׁכת]]), Ps 74:2, Ps 115:12 (sq. [[יְבָרֵךְ]]); cf. Je 31:20 ([[זכור זכר]]).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: his land Le 26:42 (H), and neg. La 2:1 (his footstool).

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: mankind Ps 8:5 (‖[[פקד]]).

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: remember the distress of his servants, La 3:19 (sq. cl. with [[מה]]), La 5:1 (‖[[הַבִּיטָ֠ וּרְאֵה]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: their devotion, acc., Ps 20:4, Je 2:2 (+ [[לְ]] pers.), Ps 132:1 (+ id.); sq. cl. with [[את אשׁר]] 2Ki 20:3 = Is 38:3.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: their intercession Je 18:20 (sq. inf. c. sf.)

definitions.title: 3. a.
definitions.body: remember his own covenant (with them), acc., Ge 9:15, Ge 9:16, Ex 2:24, Ex 6:25 (all P), Le 26:42, Le 26:42 (H, as also) v:Le 26:45 (+ [[לְ]] pers.); Je 14:21 (+ [[אַל־תָּפֵר]]), Ez Eze 16:60, Ps 105:8, cf. v:Ps 105:42 (obj. [[דְּבַר קָדְשׁוֹ]]), and Ps 119:49, Ne 1:8, Ps 106:45 (+ [[לְ]] pers.), Ps 111:5.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: his mercy, etc., acc., Ps 25:6, Ps 98:3, 2Ch 6:42; also Hb Hab 3:2.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: extenuating circumstances, sq. cl. with [[כִּי]], Job 7:7, Job 10:9, Ps 78:39, Ps 103:14 ([[זׇכוּר]] be-thinketh him, Che, cf. De Kö:§ 20, 14 Ba:NB 175); also Ps 89:48 (sq. [[אֲנִי]] + epex. cl. with [[מה]] ).

remember sins, idolatries etc., sq. acc., Ho 7:2, Ho 8:13 (‖[[פקד]]), Ho 9:9 (‖ id.), Je 14:10 (‖ id.); neg. Je 44:21 (‖[[עלה על לבו]]), Is 43:25, Is 64:8, Ps 25:7, Ps 79:8 (+ [[לְ]] pers.); sq. [[לְ]] Je 31:34; also (obj. reproach) Ps 74:18, Ps 74:22, Ps 89:5; and (obj. day of Jerusalem) Ps 137:7 (+ [[לִבְנֵי אֱדוֹם]], i.e. against them).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 mpl. consec. [[וְנִזְכַּרְתֶּם]] Nu 10:9; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִזׇּכֵר]] Je 11:19 +; 3 fs. [[תִּזׇּכֵר]] Ez Eze 25:10, ([[תִּזׇּכָר]] Ex 34:19 rd. [[הַזׇּכָר]] v. [[זׇכָר]]); 2 fs. [[תִּזׇּכֵָרִי]] Is 23:16, Ez Eze 21:32; 3 mpl. [[יִזׇּֽכְרוּ]] Ho 2:19 +; 3 fpl. [[תִּזׇּכַרְנׇה]] Is 65:17 +; [[תִּזׇּרְןָ]] Ez Eze 3:20; Inf. cstr. sf. [[הִזׇּכֶרְכֶם]] Ez Eze 21:29 (om. SyrVer Co); Pt. pl. [[נִזְכָּרִים]] Es 9:28.—
be brought to remembrance, remembered, thought of, usu. c. neg.:—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: in general, subj. Baalim Ho 2:19 (+ [[בִּשְׁמָם]]), cf. Zec 13:2 (‖[[אכרית]]); former heaven and earth Is 65:17 (‖[[עלה על לב]]); (wicked) dead Job 24:20 (‖[[ישׁכחהו]] v:a); coral (not to be thought of [others, be mentioned] in comparison with wisdom) Job 28:18; of attention paid to Tyre under fig. of harlot Is 23:16 (opp. [[נשׁכחה]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: brought to ´[[י]] 's remembrance, subj. the people, (1) with gracious result Nu 10:9 (P; ´[[לפני י]], ‖[[וְנוֹשַׁעְתֶּם]]); (2) for judgment Ez Eze 21:29 (om. SyrVer Co).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: be remembered by ´[[י]], neg. of deeds, as affecting ´[[י]]'s judgment, (1) righteous Ez Eze 3:20, Eze 18:24, Eze 33:13 (sq. [[לְ]] of advantage, acc. to Co); (2) wicked Eze 18:22 (sq. [[לְ]], om. A B Vulgate etc., Co) Eze 33:16 (sq. [[לְ]]).
neg. be not remembered = no longer exist, of name of Israel, as nation Je 11:19 (‖[[נכרת]]), Ps 83:5 (‖[[נַכְחִידֵם מִגּוֹי]]); of Ammonites Ez Eze 21:32, Eze 25:10.
be remembered, of particular days, in order to be observed, commemorated, Es 9:28 (sq. [[וְנַעֲשִׂים]] observe, celebrate).
cause to remember, remind, c. acc. pers. Is 43:26.
cause to be remembered, keep in remembrance, c. acc. rei, a person's name 2Sa 18:18, Ps 45:18; of ´[[י]], causing his name to be remembered, by some token, Ex 20:24 (JE).
mention,

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: sq. acc. pers. Ge 40:14 (E; sq. [[אֶל־]] pers.), ´[[י]], = call upon Is 62:6, name of ´[[י]] Is 26:13, Is 49:1 (‖[[קראני]]), name of other gods, neg., Ex 23:13 (JE; ‖[[יִשָּׁמַע]]); sq. [[בְּשֵׁם]] Am 6:10, cf. Ps 20:8 (De Che al. boast of, praise, LXX megalunqhso/meqa, whence Hup Bae prop. [[נַגְבִּיר]] = we display strength), neg. Jos 23:7 (D; ‖[[תשׁביעו ולא]]), so [[באלהי ישׂראל]] Is 48:1 (‖[[הַנִּשְׁבָּעִים בְּשֵׁם]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: sq. acc. rei: faults Ge 41:9 (E), the ark 1Sa 4:18, land of Judah Is 19:17, Rahab (= Egypt) Ps 87:4, works of ´[[י]] Ps 77:12 (Kt, Qr Qal q. v.), his righteousness Ps 71:16, lovingkindness, Is 63:7; human love Ct So 1:4; also in technical sense, apparently = accuse before God, alw. sq. [[עָוֹן]], 1Ki 17:18, Nu 5:15 (P) Ez Eze 21:28, v:Eze 21:29 (sq. [[פִּשְׁעֵיבֶם בְּהִגׇּלוֹת]]), Eze 29:16.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: sq. cl., with [[כִּי]] Is 12:4; no conjunction Je 4:16 ([[לְ]] indir. obj.; ‖[[הַשְׁמיעו]]).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: abs. commemorate, praise 1Ch 16:4 (´[[לְהַז]], appar. Levitical function, sq. [[ולהודות ולהלל ליהוה]]), so perh. also [[לְהַזְכִּיר]] in titles Ps 38:1, Ps 70:1 (others sub
record, only pt. [[מַזְכִּיר]] as subst. (title of public officer) = recorder 2Sa 8:16, 2Sa 20:24, 1Ki 4:3, 2Ki 18:18, 2Ki 18:37 = Is 36:3, Is 36:22, 1Ch 18:15, 2Ch 34:8.
of sacrifice, make a memorial, i.e. offer an [[אַזְכָּרָה]] q. v.; sq. [[לְבׂנׇה]] Is 66:3.—JPPeters:JBL, 1893, xii, 58 rds. [[אַזְכִּרָה]] Ps 42:5 (v.
